edu.umass.cs.msocket.proxy.forwarder

Class ProxyForwarder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.msocket.proxy.forwarder.ProxyForwarder

  • public class ProxyForwarder
extends Object
    This class implements the proxy forwarding, implements the proxy listening socket and proxy connection splicing thread. main() method of this class starts the proxy forwarding on the node.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Emmanuel Cecchet

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProxyForwarder.ProxyForwarderThread
      Thread class that proxy forwarder uses for every task, like listening for connection, forwarding packets
